ajdmom.mdl_2fsv.mom¶

Moments for Two-Factor SV

Functions

b_n(n1, n2, n3, n4, n5, n6, n7)

Coefficient corresponding to the combination

dm(l, par, wrt)

Partial derivative of moment w.r.t.

dpoly(poly, wrt)

Partial derivative of moment w.r.t.

m(l, par)

Moment in scalar

moment_comb(n, n1, n2, n3, n4, n5, n6, n7, n8)

Moment for this combination of given n1 to n8 with n.

moment_y(l)

Moment of \(y_n\) with order \(l\)

poly2num(poly, par)

Decode poly back to scalar

sub_v(poly)

Substitute \(v_{1,n-1}\) and \(v_{2,n-1}\) with their moments
